document_data.mainbody:
ai Udo Chung was a member of the Wai Clan of Tu Lung around the , as well as a cousin to the nations then-emperor,It is not stated on page 45 of Kara-Tur The Eastern Realms exactly which emperor Wai Udo Chung is a cousin of, but the timeline suggests it would have to be Shin Gisen during this time. The most likely explanation is that they are related through the marriage of Gisens eldest daughter, Shin Do, to Wai Long Hwa in . That marriage was done in order strengthen the bonds between Emperor Shin Gisen and the Wai Clan, which wouldnt have been necessary if they already had familial relations prior.
Chung lived in a mansion in the great Tu Lung city of Balanzia, a century prior to its destruction.
